sentences.sContent: Corrupt government officials were extorting money from him.
sentences.sCn: 腐败的政府官员那时正向他勒索钱财。

synos.tran: 敲诈；侵占；强求；牵强地引出

remMethod.val: ex + tort(扭曲) → 扭出来 → 勒索

words.tran: 勒索；敲诈；强夺；被勒索的财物

trans.tranOther: to illegally force someone to give you something, especially money, by threatening them
